relates to form based authentication, not relevant to us, fix will be picked up in next spring boot update
Suppressing as SMTP appender is not used in this project (see: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-9488)

Suppressing all vulnerabilities as it is for Mock generated code file name: openapi-generator-4.2.3.jar: gradle-wrapper.jar
